S.FORM: Maysang Kalimud Yang Chun Kuang) Maysang Kalimud Yang Chun Kuang) u siwkay niza Yang Chun Kuang1933 mihca 7 bulad 10 demiad 2007 mihca 1 bulad 27 demiad) , ngangan nu Pangcah sa ci Maysang Kalimud. nalecuhan ciniza i Pusung Malan a niyazu'. maala niza ku Roma Kitakit Duba' bataan duba' ingpay sakatusa a laylay kawlah). uyniyan sa u sakacacay nu Taywan ROC) tu maalaay a duba' kawlah. namaala ku tatuzu' a laylay kawlah. mangsiw tu Kitakit a nasulitan, sisa singangan tu ciniza u "Yacu Tieren" sananay. namala Kakelidan Tumuk ) nu Malan niyuzu'. natayza lipuyin , ku lifaweiyun ciniza. amicunus henay tu sulit. ) u sapuyaay a kakuniza u kawaw niza u sulit nu Hulam :Maysang Kalimud 1933 7 10 2007 1 27 ) Misun .. . . 1960 . 9000 . 7 . tingko latingko) 2005 isefi'ay). 2000 . u sulit nu Amilika Yang Chuan kwang, or C.K. Yang Amis: Maysang Kalimud, Chinese: ; pinyin: Yáng Chuángu ng) July 10, 1933 January 27, 2007), was an Olympic decathlete from the Republic of China. Yang attended college at UCLA where he trained and competed with team mate and Olympian Rafer Johnson and was coached by Elvin C.
